page.title: 17Domestic Pets
page.content: In a school{survey}it was revealed that about 85% of children have a pet at home. Most popular are goldfish or tropical{fish.}Cats are the next most popular, many families having more than one. Over half the children have a{cat}and nearly as many a{dog.}One third of the children have{rabbits}and slightly less have{hamsters}or {gerbils.}4% of the survey sample have their own{horse.}Some families keep {goats}as pets as well as for milk. Goat's milk is becoming more popular, especially amongst people who are allergic to cow's milk. One family has a{sheep}as a pet. More exotic pets include{toads, frogs and tortoises. Caged{birds}such as canaries, budgerigars and parakeets are kept by 12% of families.{Hens}are kept by a few families for their eggs.
